page.title: 08Playground Games and Rhymes.
page.content: We talked about playground games and the rhymes we sing. We picked a few:- {Free Pod.-}One person is on and the rest go and hide.After counting the person who is goes to look for the others When he sees someone he runs to the podding post and says pod Bod 123. However if Bod gets to the post first he says FREEPOD and that means he is not on. {Chinese Resturant.-}I went to a chinese resturant to buy a loaf of bread,bread,bread.The chinese man came up to me and this is what he said, said, said, my name Eli chicala chicala Eli roly poly chinese noodles ar ar ar ar pow. {Party on the Hill.-}There's a party on the hill, would you like to come, yes, then bring your own cup and saucer and your own penny bun. Can't afford it then tell me your sweetheart's name.
